findings.title: QSP-3 Changes to L2MessageExecutor Are Error-Prone
findings.description: Updating the `L2MessageExecutor` contract is cumbersome and error-prone. When re-deploying the `L2MessageExecutor` contract, its address must be updated in the `L1MessageRelayer`, `Arbitrum Treasury`, and `Arbitrum Orchestrator` contracts.

findings.title: QSP-2 Owner of L1MessageRelayer Is Single Point of Failure
findings.description: The access control to change the `L2MessageExecutor` in the `L1MessageRelayer` contract is centralized, creating a single point of failure.
